This spell makes a target deathly sick every turn. Disadvantage on Ability Checks and Attack Rolls. Wisdom Saving Throw to negate effect.

This spell allows you to repeatedly force enemies asleep. Cannot move or act. Automatic fail on Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws. Attack Rolls against it is at Advantage. Any Attack from within 1.5m is a Critical Hit. Removed by taking Damage, getting Help or being Shoved. Wisdom Saving Throw to negate effect.
